TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IcmpV4Statistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供本機電腦之 IPv4 的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定 (ICMPv4) 統計資料。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol for IPv4 (ICMPv4) statistical data for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv4 是一組的錯誤和使用網際網路通訊協定第 4 版的參考用訊息。ICMPv4 is a set of error and informational messages for use with Internet Protocol version 4. ICMP 第 4 版被定義在 IETF RFC 792。ICMP version 4 is defined in IETF RFC 792. 此類別由方法以傳回 ICMPv4 流量資訊。This class is used by the method to return ICMPv4 traffic information. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前的 ICMPv4 統計資料。The following example displays the current ICMPv4 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能由衍生自的類別可以呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property AddressMaskRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long AddressMaskRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 4 版 (ICMPv4)「位址遮罩回覆」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Address Mask Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的「位址遮罩回覆」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Address Mask Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 「 位址遮罩要求與回覆訊息用來判斷在本機子網路的子網路遮罩的位元數。Address Mask Request and Reply messages are used to determine the number of bits in the subnet mask for the local subnet. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得由於封包有無法到達的目的位址而收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 4 版 (ICMPv4) 訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) messages that were received because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的「無法到達目的地」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法到達目的地 」 訊息可以傳送到任何下列其中一個原因是封包的來源電腦：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 在電腦中，找不到目的地位址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 系統管理禁止與目的地位址的通訊。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火牆會防止封包傳遞到目的地。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 無法連上目的地位址。The destination address is unreachable. - 無法連上目的地連接埠。The destination port is unreachable. 比方說，沒有任何接聽程式可用的封包的通訊協定。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#23)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得由於封包有無法到達的目的位址而傳送的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 4 版 (ICMPv4) 訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) messages that were sent because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的「無法到達目的地」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法到達目的地 」 訊息可以傳送到任何下列其中一個原因是封包的來源電腦：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 在電腦中，找不到目的地位址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 系統管理禁止與目的地位址的通訊。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火牆會防止封包傳遞到目的地。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 無法連上目的地位址。The destination address is unreachable. - 無法連上目的地連接埠。The destination port is unreachable. 比方說，沒有任何接聽程式可用的封包的通訊協定。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. - ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#23)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EchoRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long EchoRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 4 版 (ICMPv4)「回應回覆」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Echo Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMP「回應回覆」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of number of ICMP Echo Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回應要求和回應回覆訊息可讓要求從遠端電腦在網路上的 ICMP 回應的電腦。Echo Request and Echo Reply messages allow a computer to request an ICMP response from a remote computer on a network. 這項功能通常用來判斷遠端位址的有效性。This functionality is often used to determine the validity of remote addresses. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#21)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#21)]

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol messages that were received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMPv4 訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv4 messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv4 訊息會傳送到通訊錯誤和使用 Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) 所傳送的封包的相關資訊。ICMPv4 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets that were sent using the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#20)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#20)]

summary.span: 取得已傳送的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 4 版 (ICMPv4) 訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) messages that were sent.

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的 ICMPv4 訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv4 messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPV4 訊息會傳送到通訊錯誤，以及使用網際網路通訊協定第 4 版 (IPv4) 所傳送的封包的相關資訊。ICMPV4 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets that were sent using Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#20)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ParameterProblemsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long ParameterProblemsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 4 版 (ICMPv4)「參數問題」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Parameter Problem messages that were received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMP「參數問題」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數問題 」 訊息傳送時的主機電腦或路由器處理封包標頭，例如遇到無效的 IPv4 選項或下一個標頭類型無效的內容時遇到問題。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering an invalid IPv4 option or an invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#27)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#27)]

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的 ICMP「參數問題」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數問題 」 訊息傳送時的主機電腦或路由器處理封包標頭，例如遇到無效的 IPv4 選項或下一個標頭類型無效的內容時遇到問題。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering an invalid IPv4 option or an invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#27)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#27)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 4 版 (ICMPv4)「重新導向」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Redirect messages that were received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMP「重新導向」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新導向 」 訊息會由路由器傳送，以通知主機電腦的目的地位址的較佳路由。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#25)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#25)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsSent As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsSent { long get(); };

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的 ICMP「重新導向」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新導向 」 訊息會由路由器傳送，以通知主機電腦的目的地位址的較佳路由。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#25)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#25)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SourceQuenchesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long SourceQuenchesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 4 版 (ICMPv4)「來源抑制」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Source Quench messages that were received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的「來源抑制」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Source Quench messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當已捨棄的封包，因為輸出佇列中的空間不足時，會傳送來源抑制 」 訊息。Source Quench messages are sent when a packet was discarded because of insufficient space in the output queue. 如果封包太快收到要處理的目的地電腦也可以傳送的 「 來源抑制 」 訊息。A destination computer can also send a Source Quench message if packets arrive too quickly to be processed. 來源抑制訊息是上一步中將速率縮減傳送流量到網際網路目的地主機的要求。The source quench message is a request to the host to cut back the rate at which it is sending traffic to the Internet destination. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#24)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SourceQuenchesSent As Long
public: abstract property long SourceQuenchesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已傳送的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 4 版 (ICMPv4)「來源抑制」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Source Quench messages that were sent.

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的「來源抑制」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Source Quench messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當已捨棄的封包，因為輸出佇列中的空間不足時，會傳送來源抑制 」 訊息。Source Quench messages are sent when a packet was discarded because of insufficient space in the output queue. 如果封包太快收到要處理的目的地電腦也可以傳送的 「 來源抑制 」 訊息。A destination computer can also send a Source Quench message if packets arrive too quickly to be processed. 來源抑制訊息是上一步中將速率縮減傳送流量到網際網路目的地主機的要求。The source quench message is a request to the host to cut back the rate at which it is sending traffic to the Internet destination. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#24)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 4 版 (ICMPv4)「超過時間」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Time Exceeded messages that were received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 ICMP「超過時間」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封包的躍點限制會決定可以轉送會被捨棄之前的次數。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 將封包時，每次它躍點限制的值會減一。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 「 躍點限制達到零時或路由器收到使用其設定為零的躍點限制的封包時，會捨棄封包和封包的來源接收時間已超過的訊息，指出初始的躍點限制的太小或封包已攔截到的路由ting 迴圈。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#26)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#26)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesSent { long get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Time Exceeded messages that were sent.

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的 ICMP「超過時間」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封包的躍點限制會決定可以轉送會被捨棄之前的次數。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 將封包時，每次它躍點限制的值會減一。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 「 躍點限制達到零時或路由器收到使用其設定為零的躍點限制的封包時，會捨棄封包和封包的來源接收時間已超過的訊息，指出初始的躍點限制的太小或封包已攔截到的路由ting 迴圈。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#26)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#26)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimestampRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimestampRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定第 4 版 (ICMPv4)「時間戳記回覆」訊息數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Timestamp Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的「時間戳記回覆」訊息總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Timestamp Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 「 時間戳記要求 」 訊息會導致接收端電腦傳送的時間戳記回覆回到原始的電腦。A Timestamp Request message causes the receiving computer to send a timestamp reply back to the originating computer. 這些訊息用來測量在網路上的傳輸速度。These messages are used to measure the transmission speed on a network. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#28)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#28)]
